display_long_description:
Nominated for 'AppLab Game of the year 2024' by the Ruff Talk podcast.

Let's get twisting!!!

TWISTEX is a falling block puzzle game with a 'twist'. Made especially for VR, it combines classic gameplay with original new mechanics.

CLEAR RINGS, COLORS AND LEVELS
TWISTEX has 2 game types, Ring Clear and Color Clear. Each has an endless mode with 3 difficulties, and 24 levels to complete.

MIXED REALITY FILTERS
Turn your surroundings into colorful environments, with dynamic lighting. Or select the 3D version to be fully immersed.

UNLOCK AND CUSTOMIZE
Clearing levels will unlock new towers, blocks, music and environments, for you to customize your experience.

FEEL THE PRESSURE
As the blocks get higher, so does the pressure. Try to keep your cool as the music and environment react to how you're doing.

Follow the socials for the latest updates

Discord: https://discord.gg/UucU2CtKba
Twitter: https://twitter.com/MiddleManGames1
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/people/Twistex/61555354319446/
Threads: https://threads.net/@middlemangames
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCY54MsdQ_QCMeHzz7v4XoEA
Instgram: https://www.instagram.com/middlemangames/
Tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@middlemangames
